io.socket.socketio.server

Class SocketIoServerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.socket.socketio.server.SocketIoServerOptions

  • public final class SocketIoServerOptions
extends Object
    Options for SocketIoServer

      static SocketIoServerOptions DEFAULT
      The default options used by server.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final SocketIoServerOptions DEFAULT
        The default options used by server. This instance is locked and cannot be modified. adapter factory: SocketIoMemoryAdapter.Factory

    • Method Detail

      • newFromDefault

        public static SocketIoServerOptions newFromDefault()
        Create a new instance of SocketIoServerOptions by copying default options.
        Returns:
        New instance of SocketIoServerOptions with default options.

      • getConnectionTimeout

        public long getConnectionTimeout()
        Gets the amount of time to wait (ms) before a client without namespace is closed.

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public SocketIoServerOptions setConnectionTimeout(long connectionTimeout)
        Sets the amount of time to wait (ms) before a client without namespace is closed.

      • getAdapterFactory

        public SocketIoAdapter.AdapterFactory getAdapterFactory()
        Gets the adapter factory instance.

      • setAdapterFactory

        public SocketIoServerOptions setAdapterFactory(SocketIoAdapter.AdapterFactory adapterFactory)
                                        throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the adapter factory instance.
        Parameters:
        adapterFactory - Adapter factory instance to set or null for default.
        Returns:
        Instance for chaining.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If instance is locked.

      • lock

        public void lock()
        Lock this options instance to prevent modifications.
